nodes.text: Imperial City, formerly called Galactic City, was the name of the dense ecumenopolis that covered the surface levels of the planet Coruscant. It comprised the entirety of Level 5127. Areas of the city included the Senate District, The Works, and CoCo Town. Built over thousands of years, Galactic City was home to over a trillion individuals.
Underneath Galactic City were the thousands of lower levels of Coruscant collectively called the underworld.
